org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg
Class MessageDispatcher

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.MessageDispatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MessageDispatcher
extends java.lang.Thread

The ServiceDispatcher receives plain messages in XML or TEXT format from the IncomingMessageBuffer. This dispatcher then parses the messages and passes the intermediate representation (IR) of a parsed command to the MessageDispatcher. Resulting replies from the MessageDispatcher are serialized into the plain message format and are sent to the OutgoingMessageDispatcher.

The class is a singleton.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
